name: TheComputerSciencedrill
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the computer science drill
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using the time-tested technique of repetitive Drilling by going back and forth, asking a question and providing the answer, and then quickly moving on to the next question, and the technique of Quizzing, by asking a question, waiting for an answer and providing feedback immediately after that, this Alexa skill will help you memorize the most basic facts about the computer science, focusing on the core facts and concepts.

The skill comes for free for the first 10 questions.

More Drill skills are available here: https://witlingo.com/drillskills/
